description: CMake configuration error: Compatibility with CMake versions below 3.5 has been removed. Update the VERSION argument in cmake_minimum_required to resolve the issue.
Missing dependency: Package 'libappstream' is not available, causing failure during installation candidate resolution and package file list generation.
License file 'OFL' not found in /usr/share/license directory. Additionally, CMake configuration failed due to outdated minimum version requirement (needs update for compatibility with CMake <3.5).
Maven build failure: Goal 'report' not found in plugin org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-plugin-plugin:3.6.4. Available goals are addPluginArtifactMetadata, descriptor, helpmojo.
CMake policy CMP0065 set to OLD is unsupported. Update to NEW behavior to fix configuration errors.
CMake configuration failed due to outdated minimum version requirement (compatibility with CMake <3.5 removed). Affects meson subproject setup.
CMake configuration error: Update VERSION argument in cmake_minimum_required due to removed compatibility with CMake <3.5.
Compiler error due to incompatible pointer type in libiberty. Makefile warnings about disabled 'subdir-objects' option.
Missing development package 'libv8-3.14-devel', causing dependency resolution failure during installation.
